string.text: Flesh meat

A popular choice in the Zone, flesh meat has a good taste and high nutritional value. The scientists have enough samples already, which limits its use as a commodity. However, it can also serve as a source of animal fat for gun lubrication.
 
%c[0,204,0,51]WARNING:
 
%c[default]Stalkers are advised to refrain from eating raw meat as animals and mutants in the Zone are likely to be carrying trichinellosis or brucellosis. These diseases are transmitted by ingesting infected meat. The symptoms include fever, fatigue and appetite loss, all of which are extremely dangerous given the conditions in the Zone. Abscesses, fungal growth and tumors on the surface of the body indicate that the meat is infected and should be disposed of.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,0,255,30] • %c[0,140,140,140] low-tier mutant meat
%c[0,0,255,30] • %c[0,140,140,140] cookable
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] toxic food
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] radiation poisoning: %c[0,170,170,170] +584 mSv
%c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] usable for:%c[0,170,170,170] weapon lubrication (+3%)
Boar chop

The most popular meat in the Zone. Nutritious and hardly contaminated. The scientists have enough samples already, which limits its use as a commodity. However, it can also serve as a source of animal fat for gun lubrication.
 
%c[0,204,0,51]WARNING:
 
%c[default]Stalkers are advised to refrain from eating raw meat as animals and mutants in the Zone are likely to be carrying trichinellosis or brucellosis. These diseases are transmitted by ingesting infected meat. The symptoms include fever, fatigue and appetite loss, all of which are extremely dangerous given the conditions in the Zone. Abscesses, fungal growth and tumors on the surface of the body indicate that the meat is infected and should be disposed of.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,0,255,30] • %c[0,140,140,140] low-tier mutant meat
%c[0,0,255,30] • %c[0,140,140,140] cookable
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] toxic food
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] radiation poisoning: %c[0,170,170,170] +646 mSv
%c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] usable for:%c[0,170,170,170] weapon lubrication (+2%)
Dog meat

Meat of mutated dogs is used as a cheap alternative to the more popular boar meat. The scientists have enough samples already, which limits its use as a commodity. However, it can also serve as a source of animal fat for gun lubrication.
 
%c[0,204,0,51]WARNING:
 
%c[default]Stalkers are advised to refrain from eating raw meat as animals and mutants in the Zone are likely to be carrying trichinellosis or brucellosis. These diseases are transmitted by ingesting infected meat. The symptoms include fever, fatigue and appetite loss, all of which are extremely dangerous given the conditions in the Zone. Abscesses, fungal growth and tumors on the surface of the body indicate that the meat is infected and should be disposed of.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,0,255,30] • %c[0,140,140,140] low-tier mutant meat
%c[0,0,255,30] • %c[0,140,140,140] cookable
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] toxic food
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] radiation poisoning: %c[0,170,170,170] +202 mSv
%c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] usable for:%c[0,170,170,170] weapon lubrication (+1%)
Pseudodog meat

Pseudodog meat is a common dietary component in the Zone. Tasty, with high nutritional value, a popular choice among stalkers. Can be sold to the scientists. Moreover, it can also serve as a source of animal fat for gun lubrication.
 
%c[0,204,0,51]WARNING:
 
%c[default]Stalkers are advised to refrain from eating raw meat as animals and mutants in the Zone are likely to be carrying trichinellosis or brucellosis. These diseases are transmitted by ingesting infected meat. The symptoms include fever, fatigue and appetite loss, all of which are extremely dangerous given the conditions in the Zone. Abscesses, fungal growth and tumors on the surface of the body indicate that the meat is infected and should be disposed of.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,0,255,30] • %c[0,140,140,140] low-tier mutant meat
%c[0,0,255,30] • %c[0,140,140,140] cookable
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] toxic food
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] radiation poisoning: %c[0,170,170,170] +264 mSv
%c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] usable for:%c[0,170,170,170] weapon lubrication (+1%)
Bloodsucker meat

Bloodsucker meat is stringy and thus not suited for eating. Although bloodsuckers are fearsome beasts, the price of the meat is not very high due to its limited use. Can be sold to the scientists. Moreover, it can also serve as a source of animal fat for gun lubrication.
 
%c[0,204,0,51]WARNING:
 
%c[default]Stalkers are advised to refrain from eating raw meat as animals and mutants in the Zone are likely to be carrying trichinellosis or brucellosis. These diseases are transmitted by ingesting infected meat. The symptoms include fever, fatigue and appetite loss, all of which are extremely dangerous given the conditions in the Zone. Abscesses, fungal growth and tumors on the surface of the body indicate that the meat is infected and should be disposed of.
 
%c[0,0,255,30] • %c[0,140,140,140] high-tier mutant meat
%c[0,0,255,30] • %c[0,140,140,140] cookable
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] toxic food
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] radiation poisoning: %c[0,170,170,170] +541 mSv
%c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] usable for:%c[0,170,170,170] weapon lubrication (+2%)
Snork hand

As is widely known, snorks originate from humans, so eating their meat is considered cannibalistic and immoral. However, certain factions, such as bandits and mercenaries, include it in their meals so as to show their superiority over other groups. Can be sold to the scientists who make better use of it.
 
%c[0,204,0,51]WARNING:
 
%c[default]Stalkers are advised to refrain from eating raw meat as animals and mutants in the Zone are likely to be carrying trichinellosis or brucellosis. These diseases are transmitted by ingesting infected meat. The symptoms include fever, fatigue and appetite loss, all of which are extremely dangerous given the conditions in the Zone. Abscesses, fungal growth and tumors on the surface of the body indicate that the meat is infected and should be disposed of.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,0,255,30] • %c[0,140,140,140] low-tier mutant meat
%c[0,0,255,30] • %c[0,140,140,140] cookable
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] toxic food
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] radiation poisoning: %c[0,170,170,170] +408 mSv
Fracture hand

A severed hand of an izlom - an extremely deformed humanoid mutant. It is certain that these creatures used to be humans and that they are the direct result of the second Chernobyl incident. From the remains of their clothing we can deduce that izloms originate from prisoner population that was stationed in the Exclusion Zone and sentenced to forced labor. Since all izloms suffer almost the same the deformation of the body, it is supposed that when the exposure took place all subjects were in the same body position - either because they were being transported at the time or because someone forced them. All specimens encountered so far were male and sterile. Hence it can be safely assumed that the izlom population is unable to reproduce, and their number in the Zone will be steadily getting lower. For this reason, at present they remain one of the most rarely encountered type of mutant. The right hand of an izlom is a valuable research object.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] mutated body part
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] rare scientific specimen
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] valuable
Zombie hand

This is a hand of a creature called old zombie - former human beings who lived or worked in the Exclusion Zone and were subjected to extreme amounts of radiation and psy-influence when the second Chernobyl incident occurred. After many years of being in this state, they possess only a frail body with bones and half-rotten flesh clearly visible. For this reason, the creatures very much resemble re-animated dead bodies, however they are very much alive and almost permanently hungry and thus can become a threat when encountered in packs. Severed hand not only constitutes a scientific research material but in many cases can also be used to identify the person to whom the hand belonged.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] mutated body part
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] common scientific specimen
Chunk of chimera meat

A heavy chunk of chimera meat. Since chimeras are considered one of the most dangerous creatures, their meat is highly valued by veteran stalkers who are willing to buy it for fairly high prices. The cook on Skadovsk uses this meat as one of the ingredients of the so called masculine meal, although only few claim that it tastes better than boar meat. Can be sold to the scientists. Furthermore, it provides the best quality animal fat available in the Zone which can be used for the purposes of very effective gun lubrication.
 
%c[0,204,0,51]WARNING:
 
%c[default]Stalkers are advised to refrain from eating raw meat as animals and mutants in the Zone are likely to be carrying trichinellosis or brucellosis. These diseases are transmitted by ingesting infected meat. The symptoms include fever, fatigue and appetite loss, all of which are extremely dangerous given the conditions in the Zone. Abscesses, fungal growth and tumors on the surface of the body indicate that the meat is infected and should be disposed of.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,0,255,30] • %c[0,140,140,140] high-tier mutant meat
%c[0,0,255,30] • %c[0,140,140,140] cookable
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] toxic food
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] radiation poisoning: %c[0,170,170,170] +665 mSv
%c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] usable for:%c[0,170,170,170] weapon lubrication (+4%)
Rodent meat

A small portion of a mutated rodent's body. A cheap and commonly found food that is said to strengthen your heart after being cooked in open fire. Can be sold to the scientists.
 
%c[0,204,0,51]WARNING:
 
%c[default]Stalkers are advised to refrain from eating raw meat as animals and mutants in the Zone are likely to be carrying trichinellosis or brucellosis. These diseases are transmitted by ingesting infected meat. The symptoms include fever, fatigue and appetite loss, all of which are extremely dangerous given the conditions in the Zone. Abscesses, fungal growth and tumors on the surface of the body indicate that the meat is infected and should be disposed of.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,0,255,30] • %c[0,140,140,140] low-tier mutant meat
%c[0,0,255,30] • %c[0,140,140,140] cookable
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] toxic food
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] radiation poisoning: %c[0,170,170,170] +121 mSv
Flesh eye

Mutated, swollen eye of a flesh has a number of strange characteristics, the most interesting and potentially useful of which is the ability to repair even severe damage sustained to the organ. The specifics of this process are hitherto unknown, although the discovery of the mechanism behind it would most certainly revolutionize modern medicine by providing cures for many diseases. You can play a part in speeding up the progress of science and save the lives of innocent people by selling eyes of fleshes to the scientists.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] mutated body part
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] common scientific specimen
Boar leg

Hoofs of boars can be used to produce various drugs, for example anti-radiation serums.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] mutated body part
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] common scientific specimen
Dog tail

Resistance of mutant dogs' skin to electricity and chemical agents has been the object of scientific interest for a long time. Due to the absence of fat tissue, the tail is especially suited for lab tests.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] mutated body part
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] common scientific specimen
Pseudodog tail

Rumor has it that a certain trend has recently taken over the fashion world: fur from the tails of pseudodogs. The fur is reportedly soft like no other. It is also said that it will keep you warm even in most vicious snowstorms and blizzards. For these reasons, pseudodog tails are in high demand.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] mutated body part
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] common scientific specimen
Bloodsucker jaw

Bloodsucker tentacles contain a special gland which produces an enzyme capable of dissolving the skin and simultaneously preventing blood from clotting. Discovering the enzyme's composition could be the cornerstone of a whole series of great medical advances. Some stalkers tend to use bloodsucker teeth to make necklaces and charms. It is thus safe to say that bloodsucker jaw is one of the most popular pieces of jewelry found in the Zone.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] mutated body part
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] rare scientific specimen
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] valuable
Snork leg

Snork feet and legs contain a huge number of highly elastic tendons. This explains the beast's ability to perform its characteristic long leaps at its prey. The scientists still look for potential uses of the snork's leg, and will be grateful for each specimen you bring to their base.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] mutated body part
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] common scientific specimen
%c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] usable for:%c[0,170,170,170] outfit repairs (+3%)
Chimera horn

The horn of a chimera. Its exact molecular composition is unknown, but we know for a fact that its tip is as durable and sharp as a diamond, which explains why the beast is able to cut through armor with ease. This item is in high demand as it is visibly similar to a rhino horn. Rumor has it that once upon a time a few poachers arrived in the Zone with the aim of acquiring the horn and selling it on the black market. To their surprise, however, chimeras did not make such easy targets as rhinos, so the poachers were never heard from again. All that remains of them are some unpleasant memories and personal belongings which indicate where they must have been ripped to pieces by these vicious mutants. Chimera’s horn can also be used as a crude sharpening tool, but utmost caution should be exercised because it can break, preventing the careless stalker from selling this valuable specimen.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] mutated body part
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] very rare scientific specimen
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] valuable
Chimera claw

The claw of a chimera. Its exact molecular composition is unknown, but we know for a fact that it is as durable and sharp as a diamond, which explains why the beast is able to cut through armor with ease.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] mutated body part
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] very rare scientific specimen
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] valuable
Tushkano head

The head of a tushkano. The scientists would like to study it in order to identify which creature tushkanos originate from.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] mutated body part
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] common scientific specimen
Controller brain tissue

Controllers have potent mental powers and it's safe to say that these powers have their origin in their brain. What's interesting, every mutant possessing abilities related to psy waves has a brain of similar structure. The scientists will pay handsomely for this tissue. It has a smell reminiscent of a sour pumpkin.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] mutated body part
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] very rare scientific specimen
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] extremely valuable
Controller hand

The controller seems to use its hand when mentally attacking its prey. The scientists will gladly examine it in the hope of finding the source of mutation responsible for its psy-related powers. Smells like old socks and bad kimchee.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] mutated body part
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] very rare scientific specimen
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] valuable
Cat tail

Cats in the Zone are bigger than their pet cousins and are in fact very dangerous predators, capable of moving swiftly and without a sound, no matter the surface. Within the stalker community, a cat's tail is a symbol of awareness.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] mutated body part
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] common scientific specimen
Pseudogiant hand

A hand of a pseudogiant may prove useful for the scientists who will gladly examine it. Smells like old socks and bad kimchee.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] mutated body part
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] very rare scientific specimen
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] valuable
Pseudogiant eye

An eye of the pseudogiant has the appearance of a larger human eye, but with a few differences. It has a multi-colored iris and its tear glands are exceptionally well developed. Pseudogiants are known to lacrimate profusely and regularly, but we don't know whether this is a result of some physiological process or a by-product of the psychology of the creature. In any case, the scientists would be very eager to lay their hands on it, so they're willing to pay a high price for any specimen.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] mutated body part
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] very rare scientific specimen
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] valuable
Burer hand

Burer's hand seems to play a vital role in the creature's use of the telekinetic powers. Scientists will gladly examine it in the hope of finding the source of mutation. Smells like old socks and bad kimchee.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] mutated body part
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] very rare scientific specimen
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] valuable
Mutated crow beak

While many stalkers consider crows no more than pests, more insightful ones acknowledge their usefulness in tackling the many challenges the Zone presents. While murders of crows can prove invaluable navigating and evading danger on the empty streets of Chernobyl and Pripyat, it's only after their death when their true value is manifested.
 
The population of crows grows constantly in spite of the increased knowledge of usefulness of their beaks. It seems accelerated adaptation, typical among Zone's fauna, has provided them with a sped-up reproduction cycle resulting in up to 4 egg lays a year. Their prolonged life-span, of up to 20 years, has given them extraordinary intelligence manifested especially when many crows are in close proximity.
 
This last effect has led to a rather peculiar custom among the some of the Zone-dwellers which - as rumor has it - was introduced by the very first Stalkers who arrived in the Zone after the Second Incident. The ritual - aptly referred to as "The Beak" - involves taking a pulverized beak from the eldest crow in the murder and creating a special mixture. When the concoction is consumed by the light of the full moon, it allows one's mind to temporarily merge with the multi-consciousness shared by all crows in the Zone. No one knows what happens to a fragile human mind when it is subjected to such an experience, but some speculate that this is what led the Stalker Noah to build his Arc in a desperate attempt to preserve whatever possible from the inevitable cataclysm that is about to once again fall upon this already devastated land.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] mutated body part
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] rare scientific specimen
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] valuable
Snork mask

Masks worn by snorks are apparently a version of GP-5, a Soviet gas mask, which was commonly used by soldiers as well as research and utility crews operating in the Zone when the second Chernobyl disaster occurred. Some of these people were working in numerous underground laboratories in which they were sealed from the outside world and exposed to tremendous amounts of radiation, which produced a creature we know as the snork. The mask, although broken beyond use (with cracked lenses and punctured filter hose), is still in demand by the scientific community. It can also be used to repair parts of outfits, but this process results in all remaining organic material being lost.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] technological item
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] broken beyond repair
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] common scientific specimen
%c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] usable for:%c[0,170,170,170] outfit repairs (+4%)
Dog liver

The liver of a dog, having undergone severe changes due to a toxic diet and a lack of clean drinking water in the Zone. The liver is of particular interest to scientists due to its potential for aiding research in medicine for liver diseases.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] the mutated part of the body
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] common scientific instance
Dog heart

Blind dogs have many traits, much different from healthy counterparts. One of these differences - a very hardy heart, allowing the mutant for a long time to chase down its prey, until it's exhausted. Pulse when on the pursuit reaches 250 beats per minute, which is unthinkable for non-atherogenic healthy individuals of the same weight category. This endurance makes the blind dog's heart an interesting subject for study, but because of its prevalence, the rates for it among scientists are very small.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] mutated body part
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] common scientific specimen
Cat thyroid

Long-term residence on radiation-contaminated territories resulted in the fact that the thyroid gland cats has multiplied in size. At the moment the hyperthyroidism after the change of generations is not acquired, but is a hereditary disease. Symptoms: increased food intake, increased activity, behavior changes, nervousness, hair loss. These acquired skills are not destroyed, but rather allowed the mutated animals to quickly displace their healthy relatives and to occupy a high position in the food chain. Great interest for scientists is not due to the study of mechanisms and effects of disease.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] mutated body part
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] common scientific specimen
Cat claw

Cat's claws have an unknown structure, due to which they can easily cut jumpsuits. Scientists and military believe that a thorough study of them will help to create new highly durable materials and armor based on them.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] mutated body part
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] common scientific specimen
Boar fang

Posing a considerable threat to anything caught in its strike, this fang spans a length of 30 centimeters. It is of no particular interest to scientists in the Zone due to its lackluster composition and strength. The fang is commonly used as a trophy among stalkers and has found its way as a collector's item outside of the Zone.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] mutated body part
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] common scientific specimen
Bloodsucker heart

Bloodsucker's heart have an un unstudied ability - its secrete special enzymes which halt the coagulation process caused by incompable blood types. Thanks to that, clotting does not occur even if the blood groups are different. The studies on the way this mechanism works and the composition of the enzyme will allow scientists to solve the problem of blood donor for patients with rare blood groups, as well as, probably, will open new doors for medicine.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] mutated body part
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] rare scientific specimen
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] valuable
Pseudodog fang

Pseudodogs fangs are used for tearing and holding their prey. Due to the tremendous jaw pressure of the mutant, it bites through most of the protective equipment used in the Zone. The teeth themselves are not too strong and are routinely replaced throughout life. Scientists are not particulary interested in them, unlike collectors from the outside of the Zone.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] mutated body part
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] common scientific specimen
Burer brain

Burer have a perfect telepatic skills, which are absolutely unstudied by the science. That's why most of his organs are desirable by scientists and mercenaries. The brain, as the main source of his telepatic abilities, has a top-priority in this list. It's mass is a 0.5-1.5 times bigger than a human brain. There's no any external differences. Because of its size and structure the brain can be easily damaged during extraction: wasted organ can't be used in any scientific researches.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] mutated body part
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] rare scientific specimen
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] valuable
Chimera heart

Fitting the creature's doubly nature, this heart of a chimera has grown into a doubled organ that can function as a reserve blood supply. Of interest to scientists is its possession of a high level of regeneration, providing the chimera with continued abilities in combat even after sustaining heavy injuries. It is being sought after to aid in the study of death rates among Siamese twins.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
